name: Toy Wars (Densch)
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg. In this seminar we design a small game with a new theme every week.

The theme for this week was: "Toys & Playfullness"

Game Description:

Did you ever imagine what a kid thinks while playing with his toys?

This game allows you to look inside the head of a kid, and see the world through their eyes.

Key Features:

  • EPIC ROBOT VS DINOSAUR FIGHTS
  • A glance of the insides of a kids head
  • And also:

Credits:

Coding: Denschstar

Art: Merve Gümüs (azuja123)

University of Applied Sciences Europe

Dieses Spiel wurde  an der University of Applied Sciences Europe produziert.

Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen

"One Game Per Week"  (Sommersemester 2021)
